body.draft-comment: When this is made visible, uncomment links in axvr and amgy, and add links to ascz and asdd. When it is made invisible, comment out links in axvr, amgy, ascz, and asdd.
body.note: KM staff: This doc is in the oncoursecl domain; don't add kbas to docs that aren't in that domain also.
body.p: Following is information about support hours during winter break 2009-2010 at Indiana University Bloomington and IUPUI. For normal Support Center hours, see .

dlentry.dd: Open
Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25, and from 5pm Thursday, December 31, through Friday, January 1; calls will route to Campus Operator Services (above)

dlentry.dt: Support Center walk-in and carry-in services in the Information Commons
dlentry.dd: Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25, reopening at noon on Saturday, December 26; closed Thursday, December 31, and Friday, January 1, reopening at noon on Saturday, January 2

ul.li: Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25
Closed from 5pm Thursday, December 31, through Friday, January 1
Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25
Closed from 5pm Thursday, December 31, through Friday, January 1

dlentry.dt: Technology Center Consulting (TCC) Office at the Information Commons, walk-in services

ul.li: Closes at midnight Wednesday, December 23; opens at 8am Saturday, December 26
Closes at midnight Wednesday, December 30; opens at 8am Saturday, January 2

dlentry.dd: RTCs will be accessible in residences that remain open during winter break; however, staffing for all IUB RTCs will end Thursday, December 17, at 4pm and resume Sunday, January 10, at 6pm. SC staff: Open residences are Campus View, Evermann, Tulip Tree, and University West. TCC will replenish the open sites with paper and toner during the winter break. If there is an IUB site problem, the resident should call the TCC office at 812-855-3802.

ul.li:
STCs located in IU Libraries will observe library hours.
Commenting out the following sublist because it looks like it didn't get updated for this year; date/day matchup is wrong. Info isn't needed now anyway, but as the doc's gonna be visible for another week, don't want our panties showing. The hours for the Information Commons are:
Close at midnight Tuesday, December 23; open at 8am Friday, December 26
Close at midnight Tuesday, December 30; open at 8am Friday, January 2
The Information Commons and Music Library will observe this schedule (from the drop-down menu at the bottom, select the week you are interested in).
Unstaffed STCs will close on Saturday, December 19, and reopen on Sunday, January 10.
All STCs will be closed on December 24, 25, and 31, and January 1. Normal operating hours will resume on Sunday, January 10. For more, see IUB STCs.

dd.draft-comment: STC info updated for 2009 per Marc Wagner/Tim Spears

Closed Thursday, December 24, Friday, December 25, Thursday, December 31, and Friday, January 1, with reduced staffing throughout both weeks updated for 2009 per Chris England
Closed December 24 through January 3 updated for 2009 per ctsin
Closes at 5pm Wednesday, December 23; reopens 9am Tuesday, January 5 updated for 2009-10 per John Samuel
Open
Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25, and from 5pm Thursday, December 31, through Friday, January 1; calls will route to Campus Operator Services (above)

ul.li: Monday, December 21: 8am-9pm
Tuesday, December 22-Wednesday, December 23: 8am-5pm
Thursday, December 24-Sunday, December 27: Closed
Monday, December 28-Wednesday, December 30: 8am-5pm
Thursday, December 31-Sunday, January 3: Closed
Monday, January 4: Resume normal business hours, 8am-9pm

ul.li: Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25
Closed from 5pm Thursday, December 31, through Friday, January 1
Closed Thursday, December 24, and Friday, December 25

dlentry.dd: Ball Residence Hall consulting hours end Friday, December 18, and resume Sunday, January 10.
Staffing for the IUPUI RTC will end Friday, December 18 at 10pm, and resume Sunday, January 10 at 3pm.
Close at noon on Thursday, December 24, and reopen at 8am on Monday, January 4. updated for 2008/verified by Tammy Clifford

ul.li: Closes midnight Wednesday, December 23; opens 8am Saturday, December 26.
Closes midnight Wednesday, December 30; opens 8am Saturday, January 2.

Monday, December 21-Wednesday, December 23 2pm-5pm
Monday, December 28-Wednesday, December 30 2pm-5pm
